title: 25: CEO Behavior and Corporate Decisions
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: Today we are joined by Professor Scott Yonker to talk about his research on CEOs impact on corporate decisions.  We go into many factors about how CEOs personal background and private decision making can steer the habits of a whole corporation.  Hosted by Ceren Karacasu, Yudong Rao, Elaine Qiu and David Just.
